verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's trade policies [V: are] confounding Republicans as rural voters — his strongest supporters — stand to get the short end of the stick just months away from the midterms .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's trade policies] are [V: confounding] [ARG1: Republicans] [ARGM-ADV: as rural voters — his strongest supporters — stand to get the short end of the stick just months away from the midterms] .

President Donald Trump 's trade policies are confounding Republicans as [ARG1: rural voters — his strongest supporters —] [V: stand] [ARG2: to get the short end of the stick just months away from the midterms] .

President Donald Trump 's trade policies are confounding Republicans as [ARG0: rural voters — his strongest supporters —] stand to [V: get] [ARG1: the short end of the stick] [ARGM-TMP: just months away from the midterms] .

President Donald Trump 's trade policies are confounding Republicans as [ARG0: rural voters — his strongest supporters —] stand to get the short end of the stick just [V: months] [ARGM-TMP: away] [ARG3: from the midterms] .
